title: Women in the workforce
creator_credit: Open Channel Productions and Elizabeth De Rome
brief_description: The claim that sex is destiny is thought by many to be ludicrous, yet in practice, is this actually the case? The express purpose of this film is to promote discussion of and around the conscious and unconscious barriers women have to face daily in the workforce.
creator_credit_for_label: Open Channel Productions and Elizabeth De Rome
